attributes-text.name: default
attributes-text.description: The ID of the tab that is open on load. This defaults to the first item in the list.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: Color theme used. There is no orange theme because there would be a lot of bright colors on the screen.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width -- constrained to the container (default), full width, or full width but text is constrained (auto), or text is constrained to the page width (page).

attributes.name: horizontal
attributes.description: Whether or not to use the horizontal layout. Recommended to not use this unless there are a few tabs.

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--color
css-variables.description: Color of the default text in the tabs

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--display
css-variables.description: Flex or block for the tabs list (controls horizontal or vertical layout)

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--background
css-variables.description: Background color of the tab area

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--color
css-variables.description: Button text color of the tab buttons

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--color--focus
css-variables.description: Button text color of the tab buttons when focused

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--background--focus
css-variables.description: Button background color of the tab buttons when focused

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--color--selected
css-variables.description: Button text color of the selected tab button

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--background--selected
css-variables.description: Button background color of the selected tab button

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--color--selected--focus
css-variables.description: Button text color of the selected tab button when focused

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--background--selected--focus
css-variables.description: Button background color of the selected tab button when focused

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--button--border
css-variables.description: Border of the buttons and tab area for vertical and horizontal. Use standard CSS border layout

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--tablist--display
css-variables.description: Flex or block for the tabs button list (controls horizontal or vertical layout)

css-variables.name: --ilw-tabs--tablist--width
css-variables.description: Width of the tabs button list in vertical layout. Defaults to 350px.
